headline.main: WRONG WEAPON FOR MOST WEIGHT PROBLEMS

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: A recent news article about concern over the use of Lasix in horses indicated that this diuretic is routinely prescribed by doctors for overweight people. While it is true that some physicians use diuretic agents in the treatment of uncomplicated obesity, this does not make it an acceptable practice.
